short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When using actorle, type in a string -- the extension will automatically replace each alphanumeric character with a symbol.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you play actorle and want help searching for specific movies, install this extension. It's open source (https://github.com/benh4ckett/actorle-extension).
